On this about page, you might want to add more information about yourself, 
the project, or course. Any helpful context could go here!

My name is Nick Hand, the instructor for the course. You can find more 
information about me on my [personal website](https://www.nickhand.dev/).

This site is an example site showing how to use Quarto for 
the final project for [MUSA 550](https://musa-550-fall-2023.github.io/),
during fall 2023.
